title: Passing Arguments to the Script
description: Master the art of passing and handling arguments in Shell scripts. This hands-on lab will guide you through creating a script that accepts command-line arguments, accessing them using special variables, and implementing logic based on the number and content of these arguments.

meta.title: Mastering Shell Script Arguments: From Basics to Advanced Usage
meta.description: Learn to create, execute, and manipulate Shell scripts with command-line arguments. Explore special variables, argument counting, and iterating through multiple arguments in this comprehensive tutorial.
meta.keywords: shell script, command-line arguments, bash programming, script execution, argument handling, special variables, shell loops, conditional statements
